=== Paysages ===

Paysages is my variant of the French word "paysage", which means "landscape".  If you look at the colours, you would think immediately of a sunset. The idea comes from the following Mockup. My goal is a complete look-alike gtk-Theme, but any improvements, which will allow a beautiful look on the current GTK, will be implemented.

=== Concept ===
* Dark Menubar
* Dark Panel
* Dark Toolbar
* Glowing Dot on top of Items in Dark Areas
* Improvement of the Metacity-Theme
